name: ハローキティとサンリオキャラクターズ　ワールドロックツアー
synopsis: New rhythm game in the world of Hello Kitty on Nintendo 3DS. Join Hello Kitty in this musical puzzle game and tour the world with rocking performances! Features: - Gameplay with younger players in mind: simple, fun and rewarding! - Unlock new mini-games with a huge array of cool - See the world and own the stage in exciting live shows
